name: Froggy - Frog Mini Jam
description:
Simple game about reaching the top of the level, created for the Mini jam with the theme of frogs and the limitation of only one level!

I didn't spend a lot of time on this, like 8 hours max over the past few days but I've missed making small games so here's this one, hopefully can go back and amend the obvious errors with it :D

Controls:

Use your finger/mouse to pull back and launch the frog!
